nodes.text: Buzzz was a narcotic substance which had a numbing effect when it was consumed by humans. It was added to the Fuzzy Tauntaun, a fruity alcoholic cocktail served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet Batuu in 34 ABY.

Buzzz appears in real-world version of the Fuzzy Tauntaun served at Oga's Cantina in the themed attraction Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description of the cocktail reads, "Cîroc peach vodka, Bols peach schnapps, Simply Orange® topped with tangerine, pure cane sugar, and 'buzzz' foam." The foam was further described on the official Disney Parks Blog as "buzz button tingling foam," a substance which causes the drinker's lips to tingle.
